version_description:
Thanks for playing Toca Boo! We think playing and having fun is the best way to learn about the world. We made some minor tweaks in this version for a better play experience. Enjoy!

KEEP UP WITH TOCA BOCA
Instagram:  http://instagram.com/tocaboca
Facebook:  http://facebook.com/tocaboca
Twitter:  http://twitter.com/tocaboca
YouTube: http://youtube.com/c/tocaboca

Thanks for sharing your feedback and reporting bugs — we’ve made some updates. Get the latest version to have the best experience! And leave us a review — we read every one of them!
